brandTone.missionStatement: BMW is a premium automotive brand dedicated to delivering the ultimate driving experience through innovative engineering, cutting-edge technology, and timeless design. The brand emphasizes performance, luxury, and sustainability, aiming to inspire joy and excitement in every journey while leading the way in shaping the future of mobility.
brandTone.toneOfVoice: premium, innovative, dynamic, sophisticated, confident, forward-thinking, aspirational, precise, luxurious, performance-driven, modern, elegant, bold, visionary, reliable
brandTone.favoriteKeywords: performance, luxury, innovation, driving, experience, technology, design, sustainability, precision, elegance, dynamic, future, premium, engineering, joy
brandTone.wordsToAvoid: cheap, outdated, slow, basic, ordinary, inefficient, unreliable, impractical, dull, fragile, cumbersome, generic, inferior, unrefined, mediocre

questions.text: What type of driving experience excites you most?
What is your primary reason for considering a BMW?
How often do you typically drive?
What do you value most in a vehicle?

social_proof.preheader: Be part of a community that values performance, luxury, and innovation.
social_proof.hero_image_description: A group of BMW owners at a luxury car event, showcasing the vibrant BMW community.
social_proof.first_paragraph: The BMW community is thriving, with owners like you driving the future of mobility. Don‚Äôt miss out on exclusive events, cutting-edge updates, and the collective success of our community. Your place in this elite group is waiting.
